member.name: M:Penguin.Extensions.Exceptions.ExceptionExtensions.RecursiveMessage(System.Exception)
member.summary: Recurses through the inner exceptions of an exception to concat the message into a single string for logging
member.returns: A concat of all the inner (and outer) messages

member.name: M:Penguin.Extensions.Exceptions.ExceptionExtensions.RecursiveStackTrace(System.Exception)
member.summary: Recurses through the inner exceptions of an exception to concat the stack trace into a single string for logging
member.returns: A concat of all the inner (and outer) stack traces
